subtopics.name: What are Data Structures?
subtopics.content: Data structures are ways of organizing and storing data so that they can be accessed and worked with efficiently.

videos.title: Introduction to Data Structures - Complete Overview
videos.ai_context: This video provides a comprehensive introduction to data structures.

quizzes.question: What is the main purpose of data structures?
options: To organize and store data efficiently

subtopics.name: Time and Space Complexity
subtopics.content: Understanding Big O notation and how to analyze the efficiency of algorithms.

videos.title: Big O Notation Explained
videos.ai_context: Explains time and space complexity analysis using Big O notation.

quizzes.question: What does O(n) represent in Big O notation?

subtopics.name: Arrays and Lists
subtopics.content: Arrays are collections of elements stored at contiguous memory locations.

coding_problems.title: Two Sum Problem
coding_problems.description: Given an array of integers and a target, return indices of two numbers that add up to target.

quizzes.question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array by index?

subtopics.name: Stacks and Queues
subtopics.content: Stacks follow LIFO principle, while queues follow FIFO principle.

subtopics.name: Python Syntax and Variables
subtopics.content: Learn the basic syntax of Python and how to declare variables.

videos.title: Python Variables and Data Types
videos.ai_context: Covers Python's basic syntax and variable declaration.

coding_problems.title: FizzBuzz
coding_problems.description: Print numbers 1 to n, but print 'Fizz' for multiples of 3, 'Buzz' for multiples of 5, and 'FizzBuzz' for multiples of both.

1
2
Fizz
4
Buzz
Fizz
7
8
Fizz
Buzz
11
Fizz
13
14
FizzBuzz

subtopics.name: Control Flow and Loops
subtopics.content: Understanding if statements, for loops, and while loops in Python.

subtopics.name: Classes and Objects
subtopics.content: Learn how to create classes and instantiate objects in Python.

quizzes.question: What keyword is used to create a class in Python?

subtopics.name: Inheritance and Polymorphism
subtopics.content: Understanding inheritance and polymorphism in Python OOP.
